pr_title: Chore: Fix Sonar code smells in tests

timeline.author: manusa

timeline.bodyText: Why are we boxing the integers?
timeline.author: manusa

replies.bodyText:
I see now why the boxing/unboxing.
We need to get our code cleaner.
Possible options:

Change method so that it returns an Optional<Integer> (although you'll still get a minor Sonar warning in the test)
Use assertj fluent assertions (already in pom.xml) Assertions.assertThat(GoTimeUtil.durationSeconds("23s")).isEqualTo(23);/*...*/
Use hamcrest assertions assertThat(GoTimeUtil.durationSeconds("23s"), is(23));/*...*/
replies.author: manusa

timeline.author: manusa
